danger_zone

Class DataSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • danger_zone.DataSet

  • public class DataSet
extends java.lang.Object
    Since:
    2012-10-22 Class providing an interface to the SQL database for training purposes.

      • sendTrainingData

        public boolean sendTrainingData(int cat,
                       java.lang.String text)
        This function commits data the naive bayes has been training on to the database so we can rebuild the bayes at anytime.
        Parameters:
        cat - category used by the bayes that the text belongs to
        text - the string that is used in training the bayes.

      • getNext

        public Tweet getNext()
        Gets the next tweet in the dataset. If run out, we return null and recreate the iterator.
        Returns:
        the next Tweet in this dataset.
